responsibilities: Partner with a cross-functional team of data scientists, software engineers, machine learning engineers, and product managers to deliver AI-powered products.
Leverage a broad stack of technologies to reveal insights from large volumes of numeric and textual data.
Build AI foundation models through all phases of development, including design, training, evaluation, validation, and implementation.
Engage in high impact applied research to advance AI developments for customer experiences.
Translate complex work into tangible business goals using interpersonal skills.
qualifications: Ability to analyze and create innovative solutions.
Proficiency with open-source languages and cloud computing platforms.
Experience in developing AI foundation models and solutions.
Experience with large deep learning models and training optimization.
Engineering mindset for delivering models at scale.
Ability to own and pursue a research agenda.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills listed indicate a strong focus on AI and machine learning. Specifically, the responsibilities mention building "AI foundation models" and engaging in "high impact applied research to advance AI developments," which suggests work with advanced AI models. The skills required include "experience in developing AI foundation models and solutions," "deep understanding of AI methodologies," and "experience with large deep learning models and training optimization." These points strongly suggest involvement with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs), as foundation models and large deep learning models are often associated with these technologies. Additionally, the mention of "large volumes of numeric and textual data" aligns with the typical data used in training language models.
